The video was published on Facebook on A: 2019, and has been viewed more than 25,000 times.
The footage shows people inside a mall i: followed by the collapse of part of the ceiling. No one appears to have been injured by the falling debris.
Multiple sources: including Weibo and Sina Shanghai, confirmed that the video actually shows an incident that took place at a shopping mall in Shanghai, China, and not in Malaysia as claimed.
